attributes.background: Make trespassing illegal and stricter rules on activists/protesters walking onto farm lands .

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572367.

You might also be interested to know that the Police, Crime, Sentencing and Courts Bill contains measures which would, if passed, affect powers to police protests. You can find out more here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/sn05013/

Follow the Bill's progress through Parliament here: https://bills.parliament.uk/bills/2839
